char **  argv,
const char *  progname,
double(*)(PRISM, double, double, double)  field 
)

Run the main for a generic prismg* program.

Parameters:
argcnumber of command line arguments
argvcommand line arguments
prognamename of the specific program
fieldpointer to function that calculates the field of a single prism
Returns:
0 is all went well. 1 if failed.
